title: The intended treason, of Doctor Parrie: and his complices, against the Queenes moste excellent Maiestie With a letter sent from the Pope to the same effect.
author: Stubbes, Phillip.
publisher: For Henry Car, and are to be solde in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Blazing Starre,
notes: Signed at end: Phillip Stubbes Gentleman.
The letter, written for Pope Gregory XIII, is signed: Rome the 30. of Ianuary, 1584. .. N. Cardinall of Como.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
